verses.verse: And it came to pass, when <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1129>building<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and all <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H2837>desire<s%> which he was <S%H2654>pleased<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%>,
That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, as he had <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto him at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> thy <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and thy <S%H8467>supplication<s%>, that thou hast <S%H2603>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me: I have <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> this <S%H1004>house<s%>, which thou hast <S%H1129>built<s%>, to <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> there <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>; and mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be there <S%H3117>perpetually<s%>.

And if thou wilt <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, as <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%>, in <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%>, and in <S%H3476>uprightness<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee, and wilt <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>:

Then I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of thy <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, as I <S%H1696>promised<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

But if ye shall at <S%H7725>all<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> me, ye or your <S%H1121>children<s%>, and will not <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, but <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them:

Then will I cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>out<s%> of the <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them; and this <S%H1004>house<s%>, which I have <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>, will I cast <S%H7971>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword<s%> among all <S%H5971>people<s%>:

And at this <S%H1004>house<s%>, which is <S%H5945>high<s%>, every one that <S%H5674>passeth<s%> by it shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%>, and shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%>; and they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Why hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> thus unto this <S%H776>land<s%>, and to this <S%H1004>house<s%>?

And they shall <S%H559>answer<s%>, Because they <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, who brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and have taken <S%H2388>hold<s%> upon <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and have <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> them, and <S%H5647>served<s%> them: therefore hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> upon them all this <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, when <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>, the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>,

( Now <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> had <S%H5375>furnished<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H1265>fir<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%>, and with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, according to all his <S%H2656>desire<s%>,) that <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1551>Galilee<s%>.

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> him; and they <S%H3474>pleased<s%> <S%H5869><s%> him not. pleased: Heb. were not right in his eyes

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What <S%H5892>cities<s%> are these which thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> me, my <S%H251>brother<s%>? And he <S%H7121>called<s%> them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3521>Cabul<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>. Cabul: that is, displeasing, or, dirty
And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3967>sixscore<s%> <S%H6242><s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And this is the <S%H1697>reason<s%> of the <S%H4522>levy<s%> which <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>raised<s%>; for to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H4407>Millo<s%>, and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H2674>Hazor<s%>, and <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%>, and <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>.

For <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> had gone <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>, and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H2026>slain<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H5414>given<s%> it for a <S%H7964>present<s%> unto his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>.
And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>, and <S%H1032>Bethhoron<s%> the <S%H8481>nether<s%>,
And <S%H1191>Baalath<s%>, and <S%H8412>Tadmor<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%>,

And all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4543>store<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had, and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for his <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and <S%H2837>that<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2836>desired<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, and in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion<s%>. that which: Heb. the desire of Solomon which he desired

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, which were not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

Their <S%H1121>children<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%>, whom the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also were not <S%H3201>able<s%> utterly to <S%H2763>destroy<s%>, upon those did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>levy<s%> a <S%H4522>tribute<s%> of <S%H5647>bondservice<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

But of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> no <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>: but they were <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and his <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and his <S%H7991>captains<s%>, and <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>.

These were the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H5324>officers<s%> that were over <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, which bare <S%H7287>rule<s%> over the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H6213>wrought<s%> in the <S%H4399>work<s%>.

But <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> unto her <S%H1004>house<s%> which Solomon had <S%H1129>built<s%> for her: then did he <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H4407>Millo<s%>.

And <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in a <S%H8141>year<s%> did <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> which he <S%H1129>built<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and he burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. So he <S%H7999>finished<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>. upon the altar that: Heb. upon it, etc

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a navy of <S%H590>ships<s%> in <S%H6100>Eziongeber<s%>, which is beside <S%H359>Eloth<s%>, on the <S%H8193>shore<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>. shore: Heb. lip

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> in the <S%H590>navy<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H582>shipmen<s%> <S%H591><s%> that had <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, with the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H211>Ophir<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> from thence <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>.
